name: Pain O' Paint
description:
Pain O' Paint is a one player third-person shooter. It is based on a paintball match between two teams of six people each.

The main goal is to capture the enemy flag. Each team has three defensive soldiers, two attackers and one seeker. The player has the seeker role, his objective is to capture the enemy flag through the battlefield and take it to his own. If any soldier gets shot five times, he will have to go to the penalty zone and stay there during ten seconds without shooting.

The team who gets the opposite team's flag three times, wins!

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Shooting: left click
